t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Why do incidents like these always happen? Something always goes wrong at least once a year.
That's what malicious youkai-borns are doing here, my Majesty.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: People in Gensokyo have been divided. While some praise, others have a problem to deal with.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You mean the hair you have?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: When will this ever end for the ones who despise?

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Never. Despite me being unaffected, this spell can't be turned off.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Never in my life have I seen Reimu like this. She didn't do anything to deserve this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Was this in revenge for the youkai-borns?

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: While your kingdom recognizes them, she intends to hate and persecute them.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You don't need to talk smack about Reimu's actions. She demands the spell be deactivated immediately.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You can't get inside the tower. If you try, you will just get humiliated.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you fail to let me pass and inside, you will be brought down.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Did you want to make me cry? I'll accept your duel, but my own danmaku is enough to bring you down!
